data.description:
**Step into the future** where cutting-edge technology meets human potential!

At the pinnacle of cybernetic enhancement, Horizon Lab is pioneering the fusion of human and machine to create the ultimate innovations of tomorrow.

{1645450999348487}

# **FEATURES:**

- **Enhance Your Skills:** Equip a range of cyber implants to boost your abilities beyond human limits.

- **Dynamic Combat:** Experience realistic, physics-based interactions between players, enemies, and weapons for thrilling battles.

{1213468206332683}

- **Full-Body Immersion:** Play as a fully-rendered character, bringing a new level of immersion.

- **Diverse Levels:** Embark on a journey through a multitude of randomly generated game levels, each presenting unique challenges and surprises for players to navigate through.

- **Weapon Evolution:** Upgrade any weapon to unleash its full potential and customize your arsenal to suit your playstyle.

{778331741078399}

**Horizon Lab invites you** to experience the future of technology, where your body becomes the ultimate tool.

Are you ready to harness the power within and become a legend?

**Join the revolution! Embrace the future!**

changelog.change_log:
Major Update Highlights (Version 0.2.8):

Added Features:

- New Missions: Dive into fresh, exciting challenges with completely redesigned missions for a more engaging experience.
- New Weapons: Equip yourself with the powerful Burst Rifle and deadly Revolver.
- Brand New Game Level: Take on fresh challenges in a redesigned level layout.
- New Enemy – The Crawler: Face off against a fearsome new adversary.
- Collectibles Added: Hunt for hidden items to learn more about the game world.
- Realtime Shadows on Quest 3, 3S: Added realtime dynamic shadows for the main elements of the game environment, enhancing visual depth and realism (exclusive to Quest 3 and 3S).
- New Sounds: Enjoy a richer audio experience with newly added sounds.
- Reflections and Highlights on Quest 3, 3S: Enhanced reflections and visual highlights for Quest 3 and Quest 3S users.

Improvements:

- Enhanced Graphics & Visual Effects: Experience sharper visuals and stunning effects.
- First Level Overhaul: Redesigned and optimized for a more immersive experience.
- Texture Quality Upgrade: Significantly improved texture details across the game.
- Character Movement Overhaul: Smoother and more responsive character movements.
- Increased Player Speed: Boosted movement speed for a faster-paced experience.
- Mob Behavior Revamp: Improved AI and behavior for enemies.
UI Redesign: Revamped user interface for better accessibility and clarity.
- Memory Usage Optimization: Improved memory management for enhanced performance.
- Significant Gameplay Smoothness Improvements: Achieved much smoother gameplay overall.
- Improved Level Transitions: Smoother transitions between levels for better continuity.
- Resource Caching Enhancements: Optimized resource caching for faster loading and better performance.
- Katana Combat Revamp: Completely reworked for more fluid and responsive melee action.
- Main Character Redesign: A fresh look and feel for your hero.
- Rebalanced Weapon Stats and Prices: Fine-tuned weapon characteristics and pricing for better balance.
- Improved FPS Stability: Smoother performance across all devices.

Bug Fixes:

- Gun Mechanism Bug Fixes: Resolved issues with gun bolt mechanics.
- Various Bug Fixes: Addressed multiple bugs to improve stability and gameplay.

If you find any bugs or have ideas on how we can improve the game, please contact us at info@dream-dev.com. Thank you!

Update #2, Version 0.1.9

The second update since the early access game release!

Added:

- New weapon: Shotgun
- New enemy: FPV drone
- Option to set up position and size of inventory slots
- New enemies in the training room
- New sector
- New geometry pack

Changed:

- Game balance
- Disabled weapon loss upon player death
- Updated prices in the game store for the Pistol and Rifle
- Disabled collision between player body and weapons

Improved:

- Game FPS
- Game stability

Bug Fixes:

- Resolved issue with hands occasionally getting stuck in game terminals
- Others

Your feedback is very important to us. If you encounter any issues or have suggestions on how we can improve the game, please write to us at info@dream-dev.com.

-------

Update #1, version 0.1.7

The first update since the early access game release!

We thank you all for your comments and have made this update ASAP to improve the game based on your feedback.

Your feedback is very important to us. If you have any issues with the game or any ideas on how we can improve it, please write to us at info@dream-dev.com.

In this update:

- Added additional physical objects to the game levels with which you can interact and use to defeat enemies.
- Changed the angle for the Energy Blade (Katana) with the possibility to set up the angle manually in the game options.
- Changed the angle for firearms.
- Improved the grab system, which should resolve the issue where it was hard to pick up objects in some situations.
- Added game options to the Pause menu.
- Added the option to change the volume of the player's voiceover in the game menu.
- Music battle state is now stable and no longer interrupted randomly.
- Music mix has been enhanced.

In upcoming updates:

- We will add a new weapon: the shotgun.
- We will improve the inventory system with the ability to place any object in any slot.
- We are working on improving game graphics.
- We will add additional tasks to the game missions.
- We will add more variety to the level design.
- We are working on improving game stability.
